sections.heading: Community College Transfer Grant Program created; adoption of rules
sections.text: There is created the Community College Transfer Grant Program to provide financial assistance to eligible students, subject to appropriation, for the costs of attending a public or private institution of higher education in this

sections.heading: Amount of award.  The amount of the grant under this Act for an eligible student is subject to appropriation and is fixed at $1,000 per year
sections.text: Students pursuing undergraduate collegiate work in engineering, mathematics, nursing, teaching, or science are eligible for an additional $1,000 grant.

sections.heading: State financial aid eligibility
